General.Name: Sekuro Plastik Ambalaj Sanayi AS
General.Description: Sekuro Plastik Ambalaj Sanayi A.S. produces and trades in various plastic packaging materials in Turkey. It offers PE air bubble films, such as standard bubble films, opaque protection products, and insulation products; PE shrink films; PE general packaging films; bag and sheet products; and technical films. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Kavacik Mahallesi Ekinciler Caddesi, Istanbul, Turkey, 34810
